attributes.action: Provide all adopted children with birth certificates that do not clearly identify this personal fact when being used as part of identification processes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am constantly asked for my birth certificate as part of proving who I am.  While often this is for people I don't and I never will know sometimes it is quite reasonably requested by people I know such as my employers.  The adoption certificate tells everyone that I am adopted and this personal information is not something I want everyone to know.  I'm sure that many other adopted children have similar experiences.  I hope the Government can produce a cetificate for adopted children that does not scream "Hey I'm adopted!", when really it's nobody elses business.
